title: Picturesque Goulburn Valley Nature Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Exchange city crowds for century-old trees with an indulgent nature escape at The Trawool Estate, around a 90-minute drive from Melbourne.

Surrounded by uninterrupted views of the National Trust-listed Trawool Valley, this beautiful, resort-style heritage hotel offers luxe accommodation, perfect for families looking for a nature escape or couples looking for a romantic hideaway. The onsite dining is a true highlight: Chef Eric Kwek (formerly of Coda Melbourne) serves a carefully curated menu of farm-to-table produce at Wild Water Restaurant and distinctive Asian flavours at the intimate Turbine. Spend your days meandering through rolling paddocks, discovering the award-winning wineries and produce of the Goulburn Valley, or listening to the hum of the bush as you sip a cocktail or your favourite brew on tap.
offer_address: 8150 Goulburn Valley Highway, Trawool 3660, Victoria, Australia

title: Picturesque Goulburn Valley Nature Escape with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drink & Dining Credit
description:
Exchange city crowds for hundred-year-old trees with an indulgent nature escape at The Trawool Estate, less than a 1.5-hour drive from Melbourne. Surrounded by uninterrupted views of the National Trust-listed Trawool Valley, this beautiful, resort-style heritage hotel offers award-winning dining, an outdoor swimming pool and luxurious accommodation, perfect for everyone from families to couples looking for a romantic escape. Spend your days discovering boutique wineries and the exceptional produce of the Goulburn Valley, or stay in, enjoying a sumptuous dinner at the recently renovated Turbine restaurant.

Enjoy the Great Victorian Rail Trail that runs from Trallarook to Mansfield through the Trawool Valley. Running alongside the back of the estate, take a gentle stroll through local flora and fauna, surrounded by shady woodland and open farmland. From there, trade serves on the multi-sports court, or work your way through the local and international wine list at Granite Bar, enjoying a tipple in front of the open fireplace.
offer_address: 8150 Goulburn Valley Highway, Trawool 3660, Victoria, Australia

title: Picturesque Goulburn Valley Nature Escape with Welcome Wine & Daily Breakfast
description:
Exchange city crowds for hundred-year-old trees with an indulgent nature escape at the freshly renovated Trawool Estate. Surrounded by uninterrupted views of the National Trust-listed Trawool Valley, spend your days meandering through rolling paddocks, exploring the Goulburn region or listening to the hum of the bush before retreating to the outside bar for your favourite brew on tap. Whether you’re seeking a romantic escape or quality time with loved ones, the Trawool Estate offers an idyllic space to unwind.

Gourmet produce and sweeping country views await you in the idyllic Trawool Valley - just a 1.5-hour drive north of Melbourne. Named for the indigenous word for 'wild water', the Trawool district is characterised by rolling green hills that sustain winemakers and dairy farmers. The region is a must-visit for those longing to escape, discover and indulge in the best of rural Victoria.
offer_address: 8150 Goulburn Valley Highway, Trawool 3660, Victoria, Australia

title: Picturesque Goulburn Valley Nature Escape with Daily Breakfast & Sparkling Wine
description:
Exchange city crowds for hundred-year-old trees with an indulgent nature escape at the freshly renovated Trawool Estate, less than a 1.5-hour drive from Melbourne. Surrounded by uninterrupted views of the National Trust-listed Trawool Valley, this beautiful, resort-style heritage hotel offers farm-to-table dining and luxe accommodation, perfect for everyone from families to couples looking for a romantic escape.

Spend your days meandering through rolling paddocks, discovering the award-winning wineries and produce of the Goulburn Valley, or listening to the hum of the bush as you sip on a cocktail or your favourite brew on tap.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Delicious daily breakfast at Wild Water restaurant, featuring sweeping views of the Goulburn Valley
- Mix yourself a pre-dinner dinner drink with a complimentary bottled cocktail kit in-room
- Toast your escape with a welcome bottle of Australian sparkling wine on arrival

**Travelling with family?** The Valley Room is the perfect choice for you, complete with a queen bed, separate room with twin single beds, and convenient kitchenette facilities (surcharges apply for extra guests, see package for details).

**Bonus Inclusions:** Upgrade to enjoy an intimate, two-course epicurean dining experience with paired drinks, plus a bespoke cocktail masterclass with the head bartender. See individual packages for details.
offer_address: 8150 Goulburn Valley Highway, Trawool 3660, Victoria, Australia

title: Picturesque Goulburn Valley Nature Escape
description:
Exchange city crowds for hundred-year-old trees with an indulgent nature escape at the freshly renovated Trawool Estate, less than a 90-minute drive from Melbourne. Surrounded by uninterrupted views of the National Trust-listed Trawool Valley, this beautiful, resort-style heritage hotel offers farm-to-table dining, an outdoor swimming pool and luxe accommodation, perfect for everyone from families to couples looking for a romantic escape.

Spend your days meandering through rolling paddocks, discovering the award-winning wineries and produce of the Goulburn Valley, or listening to the hum of the bush as you sip on a cocktail or your favourite brew on tap. Right in front of the hotel is the Great Victorian Rail Trail, a cycling and walking track that runs from Tallarook to Mansfield through the Trawool Valley. Take a gentle stroll through local flora and fauna, surrounded by shady woodland and open farmland, then decide whether you're more in the mood for a hearty climb on the Cathkin to Alexandra section or a pitstop at a local café.
offer_address: 8150 Goulburn Valley Highway, Trawool 3660, Victoria, Australia

title: Picturesque Goulburn Valley Nature Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Exchange city crowds for hundred-year-old trees with an indulgent nature escape at the freshly renovated Trawool Estate, less than a 1.5-hour drive from Melbourne. Surrounded by uninterrupted views of the National Trust-listed Trawool Valley, this beautiful, resort-style heritage hotel offers farm-to-table dining, an outdoor swimming pool and luxe accommodation, perfect for everyone from families to couples looking for a romantic escape

Spend your days meandering through rolling paddocks, discovering the award-winning wineries and produce of the Goulburn Valley, or listening to the hum of the bush as you sip on a cocktail or your favourite brew on tap. Right in front of the hotel is the Great Victorian Rail Trail, a cycling and walking track that runs from Tallarook to Mansfield through the Trawool Valley. Take a gentle stroll through local flora and fauna, surrounded by shady woodland and open farmland, then decide whether you're more in the mood for a hearty climb on the Cathkin to Alexandra section or a pitstop at a local café.

**Travelling with family?** The Valley Room is the perfect choice for you, complete with a queen bed, separate twin room and single trundle bed, and convenient kitchenette facilities (surcharges apply for extra guests, see package for details).
offer_address: 8150 Goulburn Valley Highway, Trawool 3660, Victoria, Australia
